EmailTemplate.name: Challenge with Distinction Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations! Celebrate your Challenge with Distinction certificate!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}
For your continued commitment to your community and for logging a fantastic {!Contact.Total_hours_at_signposting_opportunities__c} hours of volunteering, you have been awarded our exclusive Challenge with Distinction award!
To celebrate your amazing achievements after NCS, we invite you to collect your Challenge with Distinction certificate at one of our NCS graduation events in October.
Please visit our eventbrite page and select one of the ceremonies to attend. You may bring one guest.
Link to register: http://www.eventbrite.co.uk/o/the-challenge-society-7235640401
If you are unable to attend any ceremony, let us know by emailing tcs.northlondon@the-challenge.org, and we will post you your certificate.
Well done and keep up the good work!
All the best,
The Team at The Challenge Society
